subject: for Mike   Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: The Ghost Box, is training required?
author: wgungfu
full_text:
Maybe we can set up specific locations and dates across the US (and in
other countries for people here from outside the US) for general
meet-ups.  Call it "boxapalooza on tour", or whatever you want.  Have
a meet-up on the west coast, the Midwest, the east coast, etc.  Ego's
and "names" checked at the door, etc.

There's also the option of regular city specific monthly meetings as
well.  Similar to how the hacker/tech magazine 2600 has user
groups/meetups -

http://www.2600.com/meetings/


Marty



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, black bear hollow
<blackbearhollow@...> wrote:
>
> This distance issue has been a bummer for all long time researchers.  
> The only answer I can see is to simply meet up. I'd suggest doing so  
> minus those known to proclaim themselves "experts" or "certified" as  
> such claims are ridiculous.
